flexibleContent.content: As specialists in security data science, we provide a single platform that unifies an organisation’s data, then build tailored solutions to tackle the toughest cyber problems.
flexibleContent.heading: Move beyond threats and vulnerabilities. Take control of Risk.

slides.content: Harness your valuable data and move your organisation beyond threats and vulnerabilities.
slides.heading: Unify your data

slides.content: Build a solution that’s fit for the future in an ever-changing security landscape.
slides.heading: Stop solving yesterday's problems

slides.content: Stop relying solely on vendors, tackle the cyber skills gap and get tailored solutions for your specific problems.
slides.heading: Take control

flexibleContent.content: We leverage sophisticated technology to combine an almost unlimited range of data in a central location. Rapid, scalable and highly cost effective.
flexibleContent.heading: Our Platform unifies your data.

lines.text: All your data in one, tidy place

flexibleContent.content: We provide a team of expert security data scientists, engineers and analysts to build perfectly tailored solutions—removing the need for our clients to find and train expensive, hard to find talent.
flexibleContent.heading: Our Experts build tailored security solutions.

flexibleContent.content: We bring out-of-the-box solutions, ready to solve immediate challenges—then create tailored solutions to solve specific challenges (now and in the future).
flexibleContent.heading: Our Analytics seamlessly fit your problems.

blocks.content: The Discovery stage is threefold. First, we understand your problem, creating relevant statements. Second, we identify data sources (understanding data relevance, quality and accessibility). Third, we design a tailored solution—creating proven models.
blocks.heading: Discovery

blocks.content: The Deployment stage has four steps. First, we set up the environment, specifically organising pre-production and development. Second, we deploy the platform on the cloud or on premise. Third, we run security integrations before finally getting the team onboarded.
blocks.heading: Deployment

blocks.content: The Ingestion phase of the project is broken down into several stages. Through a multifaceted approach, we acquire, ingest, correlate, normalise and store vast amounts of data—making everything crystal clear and easily accessible.
blocks.heading: Ingestion

blocks.content: The final stage consists of Analytics: we create hypotheses and models to solve your most pressing problems (by tailoring existing analytics or by building new, bespoke analytics), before continually evaluating, optimising and extending.
blocks.heading: Analytics

footerCta.content: Our team of experts thrives when tackling complex cyber challenges. If you have one, we want to hear from you.
footerCta.heading: We seek the toughest cyber problems.

guides.guide: MSF Guide to UK Managed Security
Managed Security and 3rd Party Risk Opportunity

cta.content: Learn how we’re helping global organisations take control of their cyber technology.
cta.heading: What we do

items.summary: A single, unified place for complex, disparate data.
A team of data scientists, engineers and analysts.
Learn more about the team behind Prevalent AI.
Whitepapers, blog articles, podcasts and more.
